valueString: Using this patient's age, gender, and serum creatinine value of 1.3,.  Estimated GFR = 55 if non African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  Estimated GFR = 67 if African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  For comparison, mean GFR for age group 60-69 is 85 (mL/min/1.73 m2).  GFR<60 = Chronic Kidney Disease, GFR<15 = Kidney Failure.  This POC estimated GFR is within 10% of the correct value..
